Class DrivingAce

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • DrivingAce

  • public class DrivingAce
extends javafx.application.Application
    The DrivingAce class is the main class that has all of the output and screens of Driving Ace, a game that teaches users how to drive safer on the road. It has a menu and three levels. In level one, the driver lands in an inevitable crash that teaches a lesson about driving. In level two, the driver completes an obstacle course to learn how to drive better. In level three, the driver drives in a neighbourhood to learn to drive safely in a real-world situation.
    Version:
    4
    Author:
    Nicholas Glenn and Jerry Zhu
